meanings.sent1: She felt unprepared for the test.
meanings.sent2: The unprepared student forgot his homework.
meanings.sent3: The unprepared chef burned the dinner.
meanings.sent4: His unprepared speech fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The unprepared hiker got lost in the woods.

meanings.sent1: The unprepared team lost the game.
